dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and facts to arrive at a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize caution and stability over potential gains.
Your FarTwin will seek out high-risk, high-reward opportunities with confidence.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek input and feedback from peers to improve their work.
Your FarTwin will focus on individual achievement, potentially at the expense of teamwork.

dimensions.label: Decision Making Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on evidence and facts to inform their choices.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and personal values when making decisions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn and grow?

options.description: Your FarTwin will excel in structured, theoretical environments.
Your FarTwin will thrive through hands-on experience and practical application.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with strangers?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be friendly, approachable, and welcoming to new people.
Your FarTwin may take time to warm up to new individuals or social situations.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be organized, efficient, and meet deadlines.
Your FarTwin may adapt to changing circumstances, adjusting their schedule accordingly.
